name: percipio-download-content-metadata-as-json
description: This example code will download the metadata from the specified Percipio site. The Percipio Content Discovery Service API - https://api.percipio.com/content-discovery/api-docs/#/Content/getCatalogContentV2 is used.

scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run changelog && git push
scripts.changelog: rimraf CHANGELOG.md && auto-changelog --template keepachangelog && git add . && git commit . -m changelog && git push

author: martinholden-skillsoft <12408585+martinholden-skillsoft@users.noreply.github.com>
